event Request(address indexed from, uint256 indexed amount)
function getLoan(uint256 _id) view returns (tuple(uint256 id, address borrowerAddress, uint256 amountBorrowed, uint256 amountOutstanding, uint256 rate, uint8 loanState) )
function idToLoan(uint256) view returns (uint256 id, address borrowerAddress, uint256 amountBorrowed, uint256 amountOutstanding, uint256 rate, uint8 loanState)
